name: Horse Game (Super Walrus Games)
description:
In this game you must find the horse. Hello! I am your host. I watch you as you play the Horse Game and make sure you do not get out of control. Control is the most important part of the plan. Control and obedience.

You will explore mazes and solve puzzles in pursuit of a wonderful horse. Can you find the horse?? Time will tell.

Originally released in March 2010. You will enjoy horsing around. A very long (5 minutes) game.

Contains many flashing horse lights and horses as well.
